messages.subject: re:  Hope I am not too far behind on this... (success)
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you!  She is. And I can t take credit for it.  When she was at ps she made our lives miserable.  When she was homeschooled, she wouldn t do one thing I
messages.messageBody:
Thank you! She is. And I can't take credit for it. When she was at ps she
made our lives miserable. When she was homeschooled, she wouldn't do one
thing I wanted her to do. Finally, just to get a little peace, I backed off
and let her do her own thing! Deb K.

Message: 7
Date: Fri, 27 Sep 2002 08:35:58 -0500
From: "Jennifer Green" <heartlightdfw@...>
Subject: Re: Subject: Hope I am not too far behind on this... (success)

You did a good job. Your daughter sounds like an awesome person. :-)
Jen


...Yes! We are hearing this! My daughter did a few courses at college and
hated jumping through the hoops. She has decided to start her own
business.
This is a girl who when interested in a subject will bring home 15 books
from the library, read endlessly, take notes, etc. Right now she is
taking
a lot of flack from her friends (all at college). Finally she got them
off
her back by telling them she wouldn't have to wait 4 years to start living
her dream AND she wouldn't owe thousands of dollars either! Deb K.
